features: Customizable hipbelt compatible with interchangeable VersaClick accessories (sold separately)
Zippered pockets in lid and hipbelt to store small items
Top load, side and bottom access make it easy to access gear on the trail and load and unload your pack
Side compression straps let you cinch down your load or lash gear to the outside of the pack
Conveniently stow hiking poles or ice axes with two attachment loops
Stretch fabric shove-it pocket for fast access to often used gear
MicroAdjust Suspension system lets you adjust your torso length 10cm/4in while the pack is on to easily dial in the perfect fit.
